TopicTitle: Anybody knew what going on on this new "Making History" Expansion Pack?

Articles.Content: I look for any updates but i did not find anything

There's some stuff mentioned in the devnotes: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/158501-ksp-weekly-farewells-and-new-beginnings/

If you're looking for release dates or pricing or anything like that, though, nothing's been announced yet.

Pricing will be announced as a big event which will have been announced as a communiqué which will have been announced. Hard to miss. Squad is gonna hype the release beyond recognition so everybody will have had a chance to read about it, even if you will have wanted to ignore it :)
It was only just announced as something still in the planning stages. The Weekly Kerbal contains all that has been revealed so far, and it's quite preliminary.
